name: Andrew Jackson

name: Amelia Roper
text: Great place! Ordered a bunch of pizza for a meeting at Portland State.  Easy to work with, delivered the pizza with everything we would need.  Plus, the pizza was delicious.  Fresh toppings, great service.

name: Jordan Del Valle Tonoian
text: Great pizza and apps. Indoor and outdoor dining available. Extremely friendly employees, will definitely come back!

name: WCMelle
text: Thankful that it's open with safety in mind. Thankful to recognize a place with familiar faces.

text: Awesome cocktails. Great customer service. Alfredo was delicious. My meal could have been a little warmer. But overall was very satisfied!

text: My favorite 9 pm place for a quick slice and beer. Pizza is thick crust and toppings are great. Sauce is a little sweet sometimes. ‚Ä¶More

text: Outstanding service and so frickin kind during this quarantine

name: John Kamps
text: I worked a construction job across the street for the last year. I ate at this establishment over 50 times.They have great service, friendly service, great prices, great drinks.  If i'm in the area, i would definitely stop in for lunch.

name: Tammy Dorsey
text: Great people who work here, love you Paul!

name: Shannon F
text: Who says you can't go to a pizza place while you're on keto?  Got buffalo wings?  Then we're set!  And they're pretty good too!  I walked over with a couple co-workers and grabbed a wedge salad (they use feta instead of bleu cheese) and a 6 piece wings.  It hit the spot.  Tasty and filling.

name: Hilary G
text: Not good, not good at all. I was disappointed. The spice was overpowering, I couldn't even enjoy the alligator sausage.

name: Ricardo Diaz
text: Good pizza and great quality topping.

name: Phillip Vontraum
text: Fantastic!  I didn't have the pizza, but the boneless wings & tots were delicious! #Yum. A jovial atmosphere, great music... It was also a gorgeous day. The bartender/waiter was very friendly and attentive.  I honestly couldn't have been more pleased.

name: Maggie Hess
text: Yum, yum, yum! The veggie baby pizza is my personal favorite. The dough on Schmizza pizzas is also very delicious. Definitely worth a stop-in!

name: Annika Clayton
text: So much fun. Came right at happy hour and stayed way later. The small bar atmosphere for a chain was quite delightful and the chalkboard door in the bathrooms were so cool. Had my first "blow job" shot there and boy it was interesting!

name: Roni Nguyen
text: Great pizza place! The happy hour menu is amazing with good and cheap food, you definitely get your money‚Äôs worth! The location is always great, an easy walking distance from PSU and lots of businesses downtown.

name: Julie Bean

text: Great sandwiches. Fantastic service and atmosphere. Extremely inexpensive. We are in Portland for Wicked at the Keller Auditorium We live in Salem and would definitely make a trip back here just to come here. Great experience.

name: Kimie Ueoka
text: Service is great and the pizza lunch special is pretty fantastic. Pizza is pretty good. Wish the indoor space was better for gatherings.

name: Haley Huckins
text: Late night pizza is late night pizza. And the ranch was fantastic on our slices. But a couple hours later, I was sick as a dog. So maybe...go when the food is more fresh?

name: Nolan Dedrickson
text: Ordered the Cajun Gator pasta - not bad, reasonable portions and decent flavor. Atmosphere and service were good.

name: Benjamin Kuehn
text: Pretty good place to get food and drinks. There's plenty of them in Portland. Good pizza and good ingredients. If you haven't been, I recommend trying it.

name: Patty Piazza
text: Pizza and drinks are great but the atmosphere is the big deal here. Fun, friendly place. Servers and bar tenders are witty and on point. Picnic tables outside as well as indoor seating. It's true Portland at its best.

name: Nathan Corliss
text: Solid pizza, great specials, and very good rotating beer selection. The staff is super friendly.

name: Rosalie Leishman
text: Good customer service. Busy, fast turnover at lunch. A nice little pizza sports bar in the heart of downtown Portland/PSU.

name: Ross MacKae
text: Great atmosphere, bartender needs help. .. he was slammed the entire time we were here. The barmaid put 100 miles or more on her fitbit. Friendly and happy. .. decent prices,    great price and service anywhere,  exceptional for downtown!

name: Matt Breuer
text: Pizza and beer. They do both just fine. Nice seats outside to enjoy sunny weather. Get the mighty mug of PBR during happy hour, it‚Äôs a great deal.

text: Being from Chicago I've been looking for pizza I enjoyed. Although it's not the same it's good stuff!

text: Today's interaction was very heavy. We came in for lunch and it was very busy. We being 3 black ladies. We started to get take out but our original desire was to dine in. Within 2 minutes walking in the door the vibe was rude and felt dismissive.  All 3 of us mentioned at the same time. What happened to service with a smile.

text: Great pizza in the PSU neighborhood

text: We would come back to Portland just for the service and food. It is an awesome atmosphere! A++++

text: Sunday trivia! Came here for the trivia and beer, ended up getting pizza too. Wonderful time, I think I'll start coming here more often.
